parameters.name: DBInstanceId
parameters.description:
The ID of the instance.

>  If you set this parameter to the ID of a sharded cluster instance, you must also specify the **NodeId** parameter.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: The end of the time range to query. The end time must be later than the start time and within 24 hours from the start time. Specify the time in the *yyyy-MM-dd*T*HH:mm*Z format. The time must be in UTC.

parameters.name: NodeId
parameters.description:
The ID of the mongos node or shard node whose error logs you want to query in the instance. If the instance is a sharded cluster instance, you must specify this parameter.

>  This parameter is valid only when **DBInstanceId** is set to the ID of a sharded cluster instance.

parameters.name: PageNumber
parameters.description: The number of the page to return. The value must be an integer that is greater than 0. Default value: **1**.

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The number of entries to return on each page. Valid values: **30** to **100**.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group. For more information, see [View basic information of a resource group](~~151181~~).

parameters.name: RoleType
parameters.description:
The role of the node whose error logs you want to query in the instance. Valid values:

*   **primary**
*   **secondary**

>  If you set the **NodeId** parameter to the ID of a mongos node, the RoleType parameter must be set to **primary**.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: The beginning of the time range to query. Specify the time in the *yyyy-MM-dd*T*HH:mm*Z format. The time must be in UTC.
